sentence.text: Ben puts the hay into the cart.
He drives the cart into the barn.
He needs to put the hay away.
Later, he will use the hay to feed the animals.
Ben puts the hay into the hayloft.
The chicken is in her nest.
He throws the hay down to the goat.
Ben climbs down to the goat.
He gives an apple to the sheep.
He gives the pumpkins to the pig.

introductionStep.spanishText: Hola!
El nombre del granjero es Manuel.

El nombre del granjero es Manuel.

introductionStep.englishText: The corral is a fenced area for animals.
introductionStep.spanishText: El corral es un sitio con una cerca para guardar a los animales.
Manuel camina hacia el corral.
Qué bien trabajas!

introductionStep.englishText: Manuel puts the cow into the pen.
introductionStep.spanishText: Manuel pone a la vaca en el cuarto.
Qué bien trabajas!
Ahora en Inglés.

introductionStep.englishText: Manuel gives the goat an apple to eat.
introductionStep.spanishText: Manuel gives the goat an apple to eat.
Qué bien trabajas!
You are ready!
